text: mosega geuui salamdeul-ege malhani “naui salamdeul-iyeo! naega geudaedeul-ege bonaejin hananim-ui sadolaneun geos-eul almyeonseodo wae geudaedeul-eun na-ege haeleul kkichineunga?” geulihayeo geudeul-i eosnagass-eul ttae hananimkkeseoneun geudeul-ui ma-eum-eul eogeusnage hasyeossnola. hananimkkeseoneun geoyeoghaneun salamdeul-eul indohaji anh-eusinola
